item.description: Coinbaseâ€™s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-06
item.description: Didi says it will delist from the U.S. and prepare to list in Hong Kong (2 minute read) Didi will start delisting from the New York Stock Exchange and will list in Hong Kong instead.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-23
item.description: Apple targeted in $50 million ransomware attack resulting in unprecedented schematic leaks (2 minute read) Russian hacking group REvil is targeting Apple in a $50 million ransomware attack.
